name: Corn, Sweet Onion, and Tomato Salad
author: Twila Davis Reed
summary: An exciting, cool and refreshing side salad that goes great with grilled meat. Fantastic for get-togethers. You WILL be asked for the recipe! Reserve a piece of sliced tomato and a few cilantro sprigs for garnish.
ingredients: 1 large sweet onions, cut into thin strips
1 bunch cilantro leaves, minced into tiny strips
directions: In a large bowl, combine the corn, tomatoes, sweet onion, green onion, and cilantro
Squeeze lime juice over mixture, and mix in
Stir in rice vinegar to taste; the amount you use will depend on the sweetness of the corn, and the acidity of the lime
Cover, and chill for 45 minutes to an hour
